explains: adj. 首创的，先驱的；有开创者特点的
v. 做先锋，倡导；开辟（道路）（pioneer 的现在分词）
wordGroup: pioneering spirit 开拓精神；首创精神；闯劲

sentences.en: Today, the pioneering woman of the sciences has re-emerged.
sentences.cn: 如今，科学界的这位先驱女性又出现了。

sentences.en: The school has won awards for its pioneering work with the community.
sentences.cn: 该校因与社区开创性合作而获奖。

sentences.en: Mr. Koziatek is part of something pioneering.
sentences.cn: 科兹泰克先生是具有某种开创性的人。
